channel.title: About profiles, .bash* and rc files
channel.description:
We all mess around with our .bash*, *rc and .profile files, but sometimes we are not sure what the whole deal is about...
This article from Linux Journal (posted 22 June '16) does a good job of explaining the topic:
https://www.linuxjournal.com/content/profiles-and-rc-files

item.title: About profiles, .bash* and rc files
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
